author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Acer Therapeutics Q1 Loss Per Share $0.53
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Acer Therapeutics Inc:
* ACER THERAPEUTICS REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES CORPORATE UPDATE
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.53 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.69 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SAYS BELIEVE CASH POSITION IS SUFFICIENT TO FUND OUR CURRENT OPERATING AND CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS THROUGH END OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
